TopicTitle: Is it possible to pan the view in flight?

Articles.Content:
Well... As it says.

Is there currently anyway for me to move the point the camera is centred on in flight?

Many thanks.

Press right mouse button *and* middle mouse button *simultaneously,* then move the mouse...

Double-click middle button to reset the view (which is quite tricky to perform, if you have a *wheel* instead of button :\'()

UPD: Derp, only the middle button\'s enough.
